mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basicinfo_department(code, name, info, department_code, department_name) VALUES (#{code},#{name},#{info},#{departmentCode},#{departmentName})
mapper.update: update basicinfo_department set code = #{code}, name = #{name}, info = #{info}, department_code = #{departmentCode}, department_name = #{departmentName} where code = #{code}
mapper.select: select * from basicinfo_department bd where bd.code = #{code}
